title: [2004] Mothers & Daughters
description:
Mothers & Daughters is a 2004 Independent Film written and directed by British duo Hannah Davis and David Conolly.

This is a story of Londoners connected by family, friends and a certain therapist who brings all her patientsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ problems back to their mothers. Lives start to unravel during an eventful dinner party where the cook spoils the food, a coke headed model flirts with a married vicar, a secret affair is exposed, old family wounds are reopened and one meddling mother drops by to cause even more trouble.

Uploaded for the Miranda fandom on Tumblr. xx
